pr_title: Introduce build time flag property to disable the cache extension

timeline.bodyText:
Minor nitpick: Can we call give this a more descriptive name, something like CacheEnabled or something?
That would make it more consistent with the the existing uses of onlyIf
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: That's a good point, I just applied your suggestion. Thanks for reviewing this!
replies.author: gwenneg
